subject: Contributing to Eclipse - Princliples, Patterns, and Plug-ins
msgSnippet: Hi Everybody, I m trying to figure out how to best write JUnit test cases for Eclipse plug-ins. This book by Gamma/Kent seems to have a lot of answers, at
messageBody:
Hi Everybody,

I'm trying to figure out how to best write JUnit test cases for
Eclipse plug-ins. This book by Gamma/Kent seems to have a lot of
answers, at first glance. There is nothing like getting the answers
from the source. It was written for Eclipse 2.1.1, does anybody know
if an updated version for Eclipse 3.0 is planned in the near future?

Thanks - Doris
